import { useState } from "react"; const Form = () => { //formulario y estado deben de tener los mismos valores const [form,setForm] = useState({ name:"", height:"", weight:"", life_span: "", temperament: "", }) const changeHandler = (e) =>{ //e, me dice quien disparo el event const property = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setForm({}) } return (
); }; export default Form;
